original_text: The people in the land make people give them money. They rob people. They are cruel to poor people and to weak people. They cheat foreign people who live among them. They do not allow them to have justice.
korean_text: 이 땅 백성은 포악하고 강탈을 일삼고 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 압제하고 나그네를 부당하게 학대하였으므로

sentences.original_text: The people in the land make people give them money
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에 사는 사람들은 다른 사람들에게 돈을 주게 한다

sentences.original_text: They are cruel to poor people
They cheat foreign people who live among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들 중에 사는 외국인들을 속인다

sentences.original_text: They do not allow them to have justice
